metadata.Title: CVE-2023-35957 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple heap-based buffer overflow vulnerabilities exist in thefstReaderIterBlocks2 VCDATA parsing functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. Aspecially-crafted .fst file can lead to arbitrary code execution. A victimwould need to open a malicious file to trigger these vulnerabilities.Thisvulnerability concerns the decompression function `uncompress`.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and may need fixing.
